Articles.Content:
I wonder why EVE is not working on my PC. Clouds, lights, etc not showing up.

OS: Win 10

CPU: i5 6400 @2.7GHz

GPU: HD 530

RAM: 8GB DDR 3

is the intel graphic card causing the problem?

Hello.

We need more from you. How did you install EVE? Manually or via CKAN? What is your current version of EVE? Have you tried to launch a rocket to check if the clouds were really there, i mean, did you go past the main menu, as the clouds may not appear in that menu. Do you have other mods? Did EVE worked once and then it stopped? Etc...
